title: Tutorial-style content with steps
intent_text: I want to extract a small, executable plan that I can finish in 1-2 hours to move the MVP forward.
extracted_text: This tutorial provides a step-by-step plan for building a minimal web app: set up a project, implement a capture endpoint, store records in SQLite, build an inbox list, and add an export function. It highlights doing one feature end-to-end before adding more. It includes a short section on error handling and adding a retry button for failed tasks.
